name: Anastasia Mina
title: Biomedical Engineering
bio: Hi! My name is Ana, and I am a Product Development Engineer at Abbott Laboratories with degrees in Biomedical Engineering and Professional Writing (WPI ‘23). I have experience in global waste management efforts, Product Lifecycle Management, validation/verification testing, root cause analysis, project management, and audit support. I am currently leading a cost improvement effort with a cross-functional team under Abbott’s cardiovascular division. I am super excited to meeting and working with you all!

name: Andrew Girgis
title: Medicine
bio: Hi! I’m Andrew Girgis, a 4th-year medical student at BU who is going into orthopedic surgery. I did my undergraduate studies at Boston University, majoring in neurobiology. In my free time, I like to bike all over Boston! I look forward to meeting and working with you all!

name: Bishoy Galoaa
title: Computer Science/AI
bio: My name is Bishoy Galoaa, I like to teach computers, and I specialize in Machine Learning, AI, and Computer Vision. I currently work in Northeastern University. I am super excited to help everyone and anyone navigate the world of AI!

name: Clara Fikry
title: Biology (PhD)
bio: Hi I’m Clara! I earned my B.S. in Health Studies from the University of Waterloo and went on to work in industry for a couple of years before starting my PhD. I am a microbiologist whose job is to admire nature. Studying the complexity of the tiniest microbes gave me an appreciation for the beauty of all living things.

name: David Sidky
title: Dentistry
bio: Hi! My name is David, and I am an Associate Dentist at Navy Yard Dental in Charlestown. I graduated BU Dental in 2023.

name: George Shaker
title: Mathematics (PhD)
bio: My name is George, and I am an incoming PhD student at Northwestern University’s Department of Engineering Sciences and Applied Mathematics. I completed my BS in mathematics at MIT, and hail from Fort Worth, TX.

name: Helda Said
title: Dentistry
bio: Hi everyone! My name is Helda Said, a Florida native but Boston educated dental student. I went to UCF in Orlanda, Florida for my bachelor’s in biology, and I’m lucky enough to go to Tufts Dental for my DMD Degree!  I’m happy to help in anything and everything. Excited to bring some Southern charm up North!

name: James Sidholm
title: Biomedical Engineering
bio: Hey there! My name is James Sidholm. I am a Team Lead Engineer at Siemens Healthineers. With a bachelor's degree in Biomedical Engineering from Wentworth Institute of Technology, I have a strong foundation in laboratory diagnostics and extensive hands-on experience. I am passionate about the field and excited to help in any way. My skills include working with various lab equipment, repairing electrical and gas-powered tools, and building computers.

name: Justin Parent
title: Architecture
bio: Hi guys! My name is Justin Parent! I’m a junior in architecture finishing undergrad next April and doing a +1 masters year after. I’ve worked in both construction management (Landry French construction in Maine) and Gensler in Boston for architecture! During my years in school so far I’ve worked 2 on campus jobs both as an embedded tutor for architectural representation (both physical and digital modeling) and as a makerspace work study (wood shop, laser cutting, 3d printing). Super pumped to help anyone and everyone out!

name: Nicole Gendy
title: Pharmacy
bio: Hi! I am Nico Gendy

name: Mena Felfil
title: Engineering/Electrical Engineering
bio: My name is Mena Filfil, and I am currently a student at MIT majoring in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. I am interested in embedded systems (both hardware and firmware), graphics, efficient ML, circuit design (mixed-signal), and FPGAs. I look forward to helping anyone in their engineering/computer science journey.

name: Mark Awad
title: Military
bio: My name is Mark Awad, I am going to be a 3rd year Army Cadet, commissioning as a 2nd Lieutenant in the Spring of 2027. I have experience and knowledge in all branches of the military and aspects of the Department of Defense. If you are interested in anything to Military/government related please feel free to reach out to me. Looking forward to meeting you.

name: Marina Ghobrial
title: Occupational Therapy
bio: Hi! I am Marina Ghobrial!

name: Mark Hanna
title: Law
bio: Hi, I’m Mark Hanna, and I’m excited to support college students who are considering a future in law. I graduated from the University of Connecticut, where I double majored in Cognitive Science and Human Rights. I went on to earn my law degree from Creighton University School of Law, along with a certificate in Health Law and Litigation. Professionally, I’ve worked in insurance, professional liability, and insurance law. I also served on the Connecticut State Colleges & Universities (CSCU) Foundation and had the privilege of leading as its President. Throughout my career, I’ve been passionate about helping students navigate their goals and discover their purpose. I’m here to offer guidance, answer questions, and walk alongside you as you explore whether a legal path might be part of your calling.

name: Verena Hanna
title: Dentistry
bio: Hi everyone! My name is Verena, I was raised in central Massachusetts. I went to the University of Massachusetts Amherst where I studied public health. I am a recent graduate of Tufts University School of Dental Medicine in Boston. I plan to return back to central MA but work in a practice in Connecticut. I’m very excited to help in any way I can, whether you are still deciding if dentistry is for you or on the journey to get into dental school!

name: Mark Tadrosse
title: Dentistry
bio: Hi! I am Mark Tadrosse!

name: Anastasia El-Bogdadi
title: Law
bio: Hi everyone! My name is Anastasia El-Bogdadi! I am currently a student at Fletcher school of Law and Diplomacy at Tufts University. My current major is International Legal Studies. I would like to pursue a career in international law, specifically in international criminal law. I have hopes to attend law school after completing my master’s! Looking forward to meet you all!

name: Angelina Awad
title: Clinical Psychology
bio: Hi! I am Angelina Awad!

name: Evrosina Awad
title: Higher Education/Student Affairs
bio: My name is Evrosina I live in Boston and have lived in Massachusetts since I was a little kid. I  graduate from Boston University majoring in political science and minoring in Arabic. During my time at BU I worked in the admissions department, the orientation department, in fundraising, and I worked very closely with the dean of students. I am going to graduate school at Boston College to get my masters in higher education with a concentration in student affairs. I have experience in student mentorship, diversity equity and inclusion, as well as college event planning!

name: Nebee Yohannes
title: Optometry
bio: Hi! I am Nebee Yohannes!

name: Lorna Said
title: Optometry
bio: Hi! I am Lorna Said!

name: Judy Labib
title: Architecture
bio: Hi! I’m Judy. I studied Architecture at the University of Texas at Austin (5-year program) and graduated in 2022! I chose Architecture because it’s such a multidisciplinary degree, and I knew it would give me the chance to be creative in my career. I’ve worked at a few different architecture firms, and I’m currently at an engineering firm as an architecture/sustainability consultant. I love what I do and really enjoy my job! I’m always happy to chat with anyone interested in architecture, sustainability, or other design degrees.

name: Nour Tawfik
title: Computer Science
bio: Hi I’m Nour! I’m a 3rd student studying computer science and design at Northeastern. I completed two co-ops so far in both UX Design and Frontend-Development!

name: Maria Megalaa
title: Writing
bio: I'm Maria Megalaa, a Northeastern University graduate with a biology major and writing minor. I blend scientific thinking with creative expression, channeling my passion into crafting everything from theatrical works to poetry. My unique background allows me to observe the world through both analytical and artistic lenses. I can always help you with your essays writing and applications.

name: Sam Banoud
title: Business
bio: Hi, I’m Sam Banoud—a finance student at Bryant University, graduating in December 2025, with a strong foundation in business, financial planning, and investment strategy. With hands-on experience in portfolio management, client advising, and market research, I’m passionate about helping others build confidence in their financial decisions and career paths. Whether you’re navigating coursework, exploring finance careers, or just want to better understand money and business, I’m here to support and guide you.
